tour.helpButton: Need help? Click for guided tours
tour.menuDescription: Learn how to use ABParts with step-by-step guides
tour.menuFooter: Choose Quick Guide for overview or Interactive for hands-on experience

partsOrdering.title: How to Order Parts
partsOrdering.description: Learn to place orders, track them, and receive parts into your warehouse

steps.welcome: Welcome! Let's learn how to order parts step-by-step.
steps.findOrders: First, hover over the navigation menu to find "Orders".
steps.createOrder: Click "New Order" button to start creating an order.
steps.selectType: Choose order type: Customer Order (buying parts) or Supplier Order (selling parts).
steps.searchParts: Search for parts by name, number, or description.
steps.setQuantities: Enter quantities needed and review stock levels.
steps.submitTrack: Add delivery details and submit your order. You can then track its status!

partsUsage.title: How to Record Part Usage
partsUsage.description: Track parts consumed during machine operation and maintenance

steps.welcome: Let's learn how to record parts consumed during machine operation.
steps.goToMachines: Navigate to "Machines" in the Operations menu.
steps.selectMachine: Select the specific machine where parts were used.
steps.recordUsage: Click "Record Usage" to log consumed parts.
steps.findPart: Search and select the part that was used.
steps.enterQuantity: Enter quantity used - inventory updates automatically!

dailyOperations.title: How to Record Daily Services
dailyOperations.description: Log daily machine operations, metrics, and maintenance checks

steps.welcome: Daily reporting helps track machine performance and maintenance.
steps.navigate: Find "Daily Operations" in the Operations menu.
steps.chooseDateMachine: Select the date and machine for your report.
steps.enterMetrics: Enter operational metrics: hours, cycles, performance data.
steps.completeChecklist: Complete daily checklist items and add notes.
steps.submitReport: Submit report to track machine health trends.

scheduledMaintenance.title: How to Record Scheduled Services
scheduledMaintenance.description: Execute maintenance protocols and track service completion

steps.chooseProtocol: Select the maintenance protocol to execute.
steps.assignResources: Assign machine and technician for the maintenance.
steps.documentWork: Record parts used and add photos/notes.
steps.completeSchedule: Complete protocol to generate reports and schedule next service.
